text: The Chevrolet Monza is a small car sold by Chevrolet. It shared many parts with the Vega and replaced that car starting in 1978. It was discontinued in 1980. There would be rebranded versions of the same car, such as the Pontiac Sunbird, the Oldsmobile, and the Buick Skyhawk. == References == Category:1980s automobiles Monza
title: Chevrolet Monza
